00017 import tkinter, tkinter.tix

00019 class point(tkinter.tix.Toplevel):
00020     def __init__(self, master, point=None):     
00021         tkinter.tix.Toplevel.__init__(self, master)
00022         self.master=master
00023         self.point=point        
00024         
00025         self.plabel = tkinter.StringVar()        
00026         self.csys   = tkinter.StringVar()
00027         self.xcoord = tkinter.StringVar()
00028         self.ycoord = tkinter.StringVar()
00029         self.color  = tkinter.StringVar() #??? [r, g, b] or "r g b"
00030         self.representation = tkinter.StringVar()  
00031         
00032         self.visible=tkinter.IntVar()
00033         self.filled=tkinter.IntVar()
00034  
00035         if self.point != None:  # so this is edit point command
00036             self.xcoord.set(str(self.point.xcoord[0]))
00037             self.ycoord.set(str(self.point.ycoord[1]))
00038             self.csys.set(self.point.csys)
00039             self.plabel.set(self.point.plabel)
00040             self.color.set(self.point.color)
00041             self.representation.set(self.point.representation)
00042             self.title("Edit Point")
00043         else:
00044             self.xcoord.set("")
00045             self.ycoord.set("")
00046             self.csys.set("")
00047             self.plabel.set("")                 
00048             self.color.set("white") # to be read from the XML settings file (associated with the model)
00049             self.representation.set("square") # to be read from the XML settings file (associated with the model)
00050             self.title("Add Point")                     
00051 
00052         self.resizable(height="false", width="false")
00053 
00054         self.firstCoord=tkinter.StringVar()
00055         self.secondCoord=tkinter.StringVar()
00056         
00057         self.firstCoord.set("X coordinate")
00058         self.secondCoord.set("Y coordinate")
00059 
00060         # create widgets here (but don't display them)
00061         self.pointLabel=tkinter.Label(self, text="Point Label", anchor=tkinter.W)
00062         self.pointEntry=tkinter.Entry(self, textvariable=self.plabel)
00063 
00064         self.csysLabel=tkinter.Label(self, text="Coordinate System")            
00065         self.csysCombo=tkinter.tix.ComboBox(self, label=None, dropdown=1, editable=0, height=4, variable=self.csys)
00066         self.csysCombo.set_silent('global') #??? if edit???
00067 
00068         for i in list(self.master.DrawingArea.csys.keys()):
00069             self.csysCombo.insert(tkinter.tix.END, i)  
00070 
00071         self.coord1Label=tkinter.Label(self, textvariable=self.firstCoord, anchor=tkinter.W)    
00072         self.coord1Entry=tkinter.Entry(self, textvariable=self.xcoord)
00073 
00074         self.colorLabel=tkinter.Label(self, text="Color", anchor=tkinter.W)
00075         self.colorCombo=tkinter.tix.ComboBox(self, label=None, dropdown=1, editable=0, command=None, height=3, variable=self.color)  
00076         self.colorCombo.set_silent('default')
00077  
00078         self.colorCombo.insert(tkinter.tix.END, 'yellow')
00079         self.colorCombo.insert(tkinter.tix.END, 'red')        
00080 
00081         self.coord2Label=tkinter.Label(self, textvariable=self.secondCoord, anchor=tkinter.W)    
00082         self.coord2Entry=tkinter.Entry(self, textvariable=self.ycoord)        
00083         
00084         self.represLabel=tkinter.Label(self, text="Representation", anchor=tkinter.W)
00085         self.represCombo=tkinter.tix.ComboBox(self, label=None, dropdown=1, editable=0, command=None, height=3, variable=self.representation) 
00086         self.represCombo.set_silent('square')
00087         
00088         self.represCombo.insert(tkinter.tix.END, 'circle')
00089         self.represCombo.insert(tkinter.tix.END, 'triangle') # diamond, stars, other shapes?
00090 
00091         self.ckButton=tkinter.Checkbutton(self, anchor=tkinter.W, indicatoron=1, offvalue=0, onvalue=1, text="Visible", variable=self.visible)
00092         self.ckButton.select()
00093 
00094         self.fillButton=tkinter.Checkbutton(self, anchor=tkinter.W, indicatoron=1, offvalue=0, onvalue=1, text="Filled", variable=self.filled)
00095         self.fillButton.select()
00096         
00097         self.okButton=tkinter.Button(self, text="Ok", command=self.__cbOk, width=6)
00098         self.cancelButton=tkinter.Button(self, text="Cancel", command=self.__cbCancel, width=6)  
00099         
00100         self.showWidgets()
00101    
00102     def showWidgets(self):
00103         # upper row             
00104 
00105         self.pointLabel.grid(row=0, column=0, padx=(10, 5), pady=(12, 0), sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E)
00106         self.pointEntry.grid(row=0, column=1, columnspan=2, pady=(12, 0), padx=(0, 5))
00107         
00108         self.csysLabel.grid(row=0, column=3, pady=(12, 0), sticky=tkinter.W)
00109         self.csysCombo.grid(row=0, column=4, padx=(0, 10), pady=(12, 0), columnspan=2)
00110         
00111         # next row
00112         self.coord1Label.grid(row=1, column=0, sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E, padx=(10, 0))
00113         self.coord1Entry.grid(row=1, column=1, columnspan=2, padx=(0, 5))
00114         
00115         self.colorLabel.grid(row=1, column=3, sticky=tkinter.W)
00116         self.colorCombo.grid(row=1, column=4, columnspan=2, padx=(0, 10))
00117         
00118         # next row
00119 
00120         self.coord2Label.grid(row=2, column=0, sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E, padx=(10, 0))  
00121         self.coord2Entry.grid(row=2, column=1, columnspan=2, padx=(0, 5))
00122         
00123         self.represLabel.grid(row=2, column=3, sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E)
00124         self.represCombo.grid(row=2, column=4, padx=(0, 10), sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E, columnspan=2)
00125           
00126         # next row
00127         
00128         self.ckButton.grid(row=3, column=0, sticky=tkinter.W, padx=(10, 0))
00129         self.fillButton.grid(row=3, column=1, sticky=tkinter.W, padx=(0, 0))
00130   
00131         self.okButton.grid(row=3, column=4, sticky=tkinter.E, padx=(0, 5), pady=(10, 12))
00132         self.cancelButton.grid(row=3, column=5, sticky=tkinter.W, pady=(10, 12), padx=(5, 10))     
00133         self.mainloop()   
00134         
00135     def __call__(self):  # label, x, y, csys, color [r, g, b], representation, visible
00136         return [self.plabel.get(), self.xcoord.get(), self.ycoord.get(), self.csys.get(), self.color.get(), self.representation.get(), self.visible.get(), self.filled.get()] 
00137         
00138     def __cbOk(self):
00139         if self.plabel.get() == "" or self.xcoord.get() == "" or self.ycoord.get() == "": 
00140             if self.plabel.get() == "":
00141                 self.pointEntry["bg"]="red"
00142             else:
00143                 self.pointEntry["bg"]="white"    
00144             if self.xcoord.get() == "":
00145                 self.coord1Entry["bg"]="red"
00146             else:
00147                 self.coord1Entry["bg"]="white"    
00148             if self.ycoord.get() == "":
00149                 self.coord2Entry["bg"]="red" 
00150             else:
00151                 self.coord2Entry["bg"]="white"     
00152         else:
00153             tester=0 # dummy var - 0 means Ok, 1 means it is not ok
00154             try: # test x coordinate
00155                 x=float(self.xcoord.get())
00156             except ValueError: 
00157                 self.coord1Entry["bg"]="red"
00158                 tester=1
00159             else:    
00160                 self.coord1Entry["bg"]="white"  
00161                                  
00162             try: # test y coordinate
00163                 y=float(self.ycoord.get())
00164             except ValueError: 
00165                 tester=1
00166                 self.coord2Entry["bg"]="red"  
00167             else:    
00168                 self.coord2Entry["bg"]="white" 
00169                 
00170             if tester == 0:    
00171                 self.quit()
00172                 self.destroy()
00173         
00174     def __cbCancel(self):
00175         self.xcoord.set("")
00176         self.ycoord.set("")
00177         self.csys.set("")
00178         self.plabel.set("")                                 
00179         self.quit()
00180         self.destroy()
00181 
00182     def __setPolar(self, event=0):
00183         if self.master.DrawingArea.csys[self.csys.get()]["floatinfo"].type_=="polar":
00184             self.firstCoord.set("Polar axis")    
00185             self.secondCoord.set("Polar angle")             
00186         
00187         if self.master.DrawingArea.csys[self.csys.get()]["floatinfo"].type_=="cartesian":
00188             self.firstCoord.set("X coordinate")    
00189             self.secondCoord.set("Y coordinate")
00190             
00191         self.update_idletasks()
